thread.title: Clinton Anthony Johnson
thread.title_full: Truecar reviewed by Clinton Anthony Johnson

author: Clinton Anthony Johnson
title: Clinton Anthony Johnson
text: Remember that commercial about banks coming to you competing for your business...TrueCar brings that to the auto industry. My next vehicle...probably another VW...will be purchased through TrueCar. The dealers don't waste your time. They know what you're looking for when you walk in the door and already have a test vehicle waiting when you arrive for your scheduled appointment...so much better than CarMax.
